languages.text: {n}Вам доводилось слышать истории о несчастных, что имели неосторожность подойти слишком близко к "мозговому листу". Его мясистые листья, каждое — с подобием собственного сознания, сливаются с нервной системой жертв, превращая тех в безмозглых марионеток-носителей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вам доводилось слышать истории о несчастных, что имели неосторожность подойти слишком близко к "мозговому листу". Его мясистые листья, каждое — с подобием собственного сознания, сливаются с нервной системой жертв, превращая тех в безмозглых марионеток-носителей.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the "brain leaf." Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам доводилось слышать истории о несчастных, что имели неосторожность подойти слишком близко к "мозговому листу". Его мясистые листья, каждое — с подобием собственного сознания, сливаются с нервной системой жертв, превращая тех в безмозглых марионеток-носителей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the 'brain leaf'. Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

{n}You heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the 'brain leaf'. Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of consciousness of its own, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

{n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the 'brain leaf'. Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

{n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the "brain leaf." Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

{n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the "brain leaf." Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

languages.text: {n}不注意から「ブレインリーフ」に近づきすぎた不幸な人々の話を聞いたことがあるだろう。その肉厚の葉はそれぞれに意識のようなものを持っており、犠牲者の神経系と融合して、心を失った運搬用の人形に変えてしまうという。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the "brain leaf." Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}不注意から「ブレインリーフ」に近づきすぎた不幸な人々の話を聞いたことがあるだろう。その肉厚の葉はそれぞれに意識のようなものを持っており、犠牲者の神経系と融合して、心を失った運搬用の人形に変えてしまうという。{/n}

languages.text: {n}También conoces las historias sobre los desdichados que se han acercado demasiado a la «hoja cerebral». Sus carnosas hojas, aparentemente dotadas de consciencia individual, se funden con el sistema nervioso de sus víctimas y las convierten en meros títeres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the "brain leaf." Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}También conoces las historias sobre los desdichados que se han acercado demasiado a la «hoja cerebral». Sus carnosas hojas, aparentemente dotadas de consciencia individual, se funden con el sistema nervioso de sus víctimas y las convierten en meros títeres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听说过那些粗心大意的受害者因为太过靠近“噬脑叶”而发生的惨剧。这种肥厚的叶子每一片都具有独立的意识，它可以融入受害者的神经系统，将人变成受其支配的傀儡。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the "brain leaf." Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你听说过那些粗心大意的受害者因为太过靠近“噬脑叶”而发生的惨剧。这种肥厚的叶子每一片都具有独立的意识，它可以融入受害者的神经系统，将人变成受其支配的傀儡。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez entendu des histoires mentionnant les pauvres âmes qui ont eu le malheur de s'approcher un peu trop près de plants de « cérébrite ». Ses feuilles charnues disposent d'une conscience individuelle et sont capables de s'immiscer dans le système nerveux de leurs victimes, les transformant en marionnettes dénuées de volonté propre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the "brain leaf." Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez entendu des histoires mentionnant les pauvres âmes qui ont eu le malheur de s'approcher un peu trop près de plants de « cérébrite ». Ses feuilles charnues disposent d'une conscience individuelle et sont capables de s'immiscer dans le système nerveux de leurs victimes, les transformant en marionnettes dénuées de volonté propre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast die Geschichten der armen Seelen gehört, die so töricht waren, dem "Hirnblatt" zu nah zu kommen. Seine fleischigen Wedel, die jeweils ein rudimentäres individuelles Bewusstsein besitzen, fusionieren mit dem Nervensystem seiner Opfer und verwandeln sie in hirnlose Marionetten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the "brain leaf." Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}

languages.text: {n}"Beyin yaprağı" bitkisine fazla yaklaşacak kadar dikkatsiz davranan talihsizlerin başına gelenleri duymuştun. Bitkinin iri yapraklarından her birinin ayrı bir bilinci vardır. Yapraklar, kurbanının sinir sistemiyle birleşerek onu akılsız bir taşıyıcı kuklaya dönüştürür.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard the stories about the unfortunate souls who were careless enough to get too close to the "brain leaf." Its fleshy fronds, each with a semblance of individual consciousness, merge with the nervous system of its victims, turning them into mindless carrier puppets.{/n}
